mapper.insert: insert into user_coupons(user_id, coupon_id, token, assign_date, consume_date) values (#{userId}, #{couponId}, #{token}, #{assignDate}, #{consumeDate})
mapper.select: select id, user_id as userId, coupon_id as couponId, token, assign_date as assignDate, consume_date as consumeDate from user_coupons where user_id = #{userId}
